# DatePickerStyleConfiguration.Label

**Structure**

A type-erased label of a `DatePicker`.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Label
```

## Labeling the date picker

- **label**: A description of the `DatePicker`.
- **displayedComponents**: The date components that the user is able to view and edit.

## Conforms To

- View

items.description: The date components that the user is able to view and edit.
items.name: displayedComponents

title: DatePickerStyleConfiguration.Label
